text: “Datɨrɨghɨn ga uaning ko akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavitam damigh, egh namakar aghuimningɨn ikiam, mati gan afeziamning amizɨ mokɨn. Kɨ nɨ bagha silvaba ko golɨn kaba amadi. Eghtɨ nɨ Israelian Atrivim Basa ko amizir akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavim abightɨ, a uan mɨdorozir gumaziba inigh mangɨ egh nan nguazim atakigh.”
